expected.text: This weapon deals primarily Radiation damage.
Primary fire shoots six continuous beams.

children.text: Pinpoint accuracy.
Innate multishot of 6 beams.
Tied with Convectrix and Phage for the highest fire rate of all shotguns.
Consumes 0.5 ammo per tick of damage.
Innate Infinite Body Punch Through.

expected.text: Alternate Fire charges the weapon to fire a large plasma bomb that explodes in a 4.8 meter radius, which then releases 5 seeking projectiles.

children.text: The longer the charge is held down, the more damage is dealt by the explosion and its projectiles.
Plasma bomb and seeking projectiles have a guaranteed Impact proc.
Initial hit and explosion apply status separately.
Explosion does not need direct line of sight to deal damage and will penetrate walls.

expected.text: Advantages over other Primary weapons (excluding modular weapons):

children.text: Very high overall status chance.
Fastest reload speed of all primary shotguns.
No damage fall-off.

expected.text: Disadvantages over other Primary weapons (excluding modular weapons):

children.text: Lowest critical chance of all shotguns.
Primary Fire:
Damage ramps up from 15% to 100% over 0.6 seconds when firing. After firing stops for 0.8 seconds, the damage decays back to 15% over 2 seconds.
Innate punch through does not apply to surfaces, requiring punch through mods.
Limited range of 20 meters.
Alternate Fire:
Projectile has travel time with heavy arcing.
Explosion inflicts self-stagger.
Explosion has a headshot multiplier of 1x and cannot trigger headshot conditions.
Explosion has linear Damage Falloff from 100% to 50% from central impact.
Low Ammo Pickup.
